name: Q-YO Blaster
summary: Q-YO Blaster is a shooting game, with peculiar characters, strange enemies, weapons and many explosions. Enter the miniature world and stop the threat

name: Qybe
summary: Qybe is a fresh & innovative speed runner with dark atmosphere & smooth graphics, where you're set to navigate a Cube through lots of different Levels as fast - and as creatively - as possible. Easily create & share your own maps with the community using the included Editor - then watch others run them!

name: Qyllscape
summary: Qyllscape (verb): The act of an author becoming a traveler in another world.
